user.title: Set up DALI Center gateway
user.description:
**Two-step process:**

1. Select **Submit** to start discovery (searches for up to 3 minutes)
2. Short-press the Reset button on your DALI gateway device **once**

The gateway will respond immediately after the button press.
Ensure the gateway is powered and on the same network.
